steps.name: The user is on drugs.com Homepage.

elements.name: User can fill out the form through contact us button on the homepage.

steps.name: The user clicks on the Contact Us button
Clicks on the Contact form button
Selects the app feedback/suggestion from the drop down.
Fills out the Name,Email address and Message
Selects the checkbox to accept the policy

elements.description: Given:The user is on the Drugs.com homepage.

elements.name: The User searches for Metformin information

steps.name: the user clicks on Drugs & Medication

elements.description: Given:The user is on the Drugs.com homepage.

elements.name: The User searches for New Drugs

steps.name: the user clicks on new drugs
user should get all new drugs related information
